name: The Art Gallery (JefftLink)
description:
Sleep. Sleep is a rare thing for you. So you cherish the nights you get more than a couple of hours of the sweet respite.

Your phone ringing next to your bed lets you know that this will not be one of those nights.

'Hello?' you answer, sitting up in your bed.

 'Hey Detective, sorry to wake you up so late, but we have a strange case for you.' says the police dispatcher on the other end of the line.

'What are the details?'  you sigh.

'It seems like a robbery gone wrong. You'd best head down there, the officer at the scene will fill you in.'

'Ok, send me the address' you reply as you get up and start getting dressed. The dispatcher sends you the address for 'Spotlight' Art Gallery, and you call a cab. 'Coffee first' you think getting into the car.

The Art Gallery is a text-based puzzle-hunt game, inspired by the 'Cryptex Hunt 2021' games. Navigate your way through puzzles in a strange art gallery to get to the bottom of what is going on. You might need Google, a pen and some paper.
